projects.title: Honma 2021-present
projects.description: I'm currently working on this Japanese dialect language app in a team. Made with React Native with Redux for frontend and Ruby on Rails for API using Postgres database.

projects.title: Brio Mobile 2020-present
projects.description: I made this activity suggestion app in React Native using Redux and Redux-Saga during my second internship at EyeCue Lab. It has data visualization using JS libraries, and also integrates Spotify API for OAuth and user details.
